attributes.action: Ban the teaching of inappropriate sexual content in schools to children
attributes.background: US President elect Donald J Trump has initiated the banning of teaching of inappropriate sexual content in schools. Whilst sex education is vitally important it must be done at an appropriate age, with full parental knowledge, consent and consultation on the content. We should do the same.

rejection.details: Government guidance indicates schools should consult parents. You can find more information here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/media/62cea352e90e071e789ea9bf/Relationships_Education_RSE_and_Health_Education.pdf
